did.unittitle: The William Plumley/Robert Penn Warren Collection

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: William Plumley presents this small archive of material on and from Robert Penn Warren as it reveals Warren’s working as a poet and writer. He corresponded with Warren in the years 1969 through 1984, and that correspondence is an important component of this collection.

userestrict.head: Summary of Contents of the Archive
userestrict.p: Correspondence, three nlanuscripts (typescripts); one signed photograph; the original video of the PBS interview; sis unit of the same interview; audiotape of Dr. Foster’s interview with Warren; ephemera. Plus signed typescript by Allen Tate, colleague

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: The 1999 National Faculty Directory lists William Plumley in Humanities at the University of Charleston, 2300 MacCorkle, S. E., Charleston, West Virginia 25304-1099.
